com.hannesdorfmann.mosby3.mvp

Interface MvpPresenter<V extends MvpView>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    MviPresenter<V,VS>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    MviBasePresenter, MvpBasePresenter, MvpNullObjectBasePresenter

    public interface MvpPresenter<V extends MvpView>
    The base interface for each mvp presenter.

    Mosby assumes that all interaction (i.e. updating the View) between Presenter and View is executed on android's main UI thread.

    Since:
    1.0.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attachView(V view)
      Set or attach the view to this presenter
      void detachView(boolean retainInstance)
      Will be called if the view has been destroyed.

    • Method Detail

      • attachView

        void attachView(V view)
        Set or attach the view to this presenter

      • detachView

        void detachView(boolean retainInstance)
        Will be called if the view has been destroyed. Typically this method will be invoked from Activity.detachView() or Fragment.onDestroyView()
